00015 #ifndef TEXTBOX_H
00016 #define TEXTBOX_H

00018 #include "control.h"
00019 #include "../fontmgr.h"
00020 
00021 #include <string>
00022 #include <vector>
00023 #include <list>
00024 
00025 struct FontChar {
00026         char c; //the actual char
00027         float r, g, b, a; //colors
00028         float s, t, s2, t2; //texcoords
00029         float x, y; //vertex position
00030         float width, height; //width of the texture
00031         float advance;
00032 };
00033 
00034 struct FontString {
00035         unsigned short font; //the font id
00036         unsigned short Size; //the number of characters
00037         unsigned int Start; //the first position in the VBO
00038         unsigned int Length; //the length (in bytes) we occupy in the vbo
00039         float y; //the y coord wont change inside of a string
00040         unsigned int Width, Height; //the current width of the string (used to find the x of the next char) and the height (needed?)
00041         std::list<FontChar> Text;
00042         unsigned int vao;
00043 };
00044 
00045 class Label : public Control {
00046 public:
00047         Label(std::string, Window*, Control* = NULL, float = 0, float = 0);
00048         ~Label();
00049 
00050         virtual void RenderText(int, int, int);
00051 
00052         virtual void onMousePress(int);
00053         virtual void onMouseRelease(int);
00054 
00055         virtual void onKeyPress(unsigned short);
00056         virtual void onKeyRelease(int, int);
00057 
00058         virtual void Move(float, float);
00059 
00060         virtual void SetWidth(unsigned short);
00061         virtual void SetHeight(unsigned short);
00062 
00063         virtual void UpdateVBO();
00064         virtual void AddStringsToVBO();
00065         virtual void ReplaceCharVBO(FontChar);
00066         virtual void RebuildVBOLine(FontString);
00067 
00068         virtual void AddChar(FontChar, bool);
00069         virtual void AppendString(unsigned int, unsigned int, FontString);
00070 protected:
00071         unsigned short TextWidth;
00072         unsigned short CaretPos, CaretLine;
00073         unsigned short BottomLine; //the index of the bottome line
00074         unsigned short NumCharacters, NumLines;
00075         unsigned short MaxCharacters, MaxLines;
00076         unsigned int TextPosition, TextLength;
00077         bool Multiline;
00078         bool FlashCaret;
00079         bool ShowingCaret;
00080         bool Editable;
00081         std::vector<FontString> lines;
00082 private:
00083 };
